titleStmt.title: A proclamation for apprehending several traitors and fugitives
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1685-1688 : James II)
James II, King of England, 1633-1701.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library
At end of text: Given under our signet at Edingburgh, the twenty forth day of June, 1685.
